Nodes.Text: For centuries our castles lay forgotten in ruin….
We will rise from the shadows…
Their blood will become... our power
Vampires will conquer the night, and all who oppose us!
You who dare challenge my rule…
Defy my reign, and face devastation!
Know my name… Fear my wrath…!
But man rose up against us
For centuries, hidden away in darkness
Destroys all objects, units and items in a large area.
Apply a shield to target ally or self that shields the target for <skillcolor>{absorb}</c> of your spell power. Knocks nearby enemies back when the shield is applied.

Summon a pillar of blood healing allies for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your spell power. The pillar erupts after <skillcolor>{delay}s</c> inflicting <blood>Leech</c> and dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage to enemies while healing allies for <skillcolor>{healing2}</c> of your spell power.

Heal nearby allies for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your spell power and apply a fading haste that increases movement speed by <skillcolor>{hastefactor}</c> and attack speed by <skillcolor>{attackspeed}</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Inflicts <blood>Leech</c> on nearby enemies.

Become invulnerable and channel a blood storm, launching up to <skillcolor>{count}</c> homing blood bolts towards nearby enemies over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Each bolt deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <blood>Leech</c>. \n\nEnd the storm by unleashing a powerful nova of blood dealing <skillcolor>{novadamage}</c> magic damage and pushing nearby enemies away,
Summon <skillcolor>{count}</c> blood bats in a line that attacks towards your target location. Each bat pierces enemies dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c>.
Increases damage and healing done by your blood nova.

Block melee and projectile attacks for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Blocking an attack triggers a blood nova that pushes enemies away and dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c>.\n\nTurn immaterial for <skillcolor>{immaterialduration}s</c> when this effect triggers.

Channel a beam of energy that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <blood>Leech</c> to enemies hit while healing allies for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your spell power per second for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Each target hit heals self for <skillcolor>{selfhealing}</c> of your spell power.
Effect that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage to you and all nearby allies upon expiration

Dash forward and strike enemies in a line. Deals <skillcolor>{dotdamage}</c> magic damage and heals self for <skillcolor>{dothealing}</c> of your spell power over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. A nova of blood erupts when the effect ends dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c> to the victim and nearby enemies.

Launch a projectile that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage, drains <skillcolor>{leech}</c> health and inflicts <blood>Leech</c>. Heals ally hit for <skillcolor>{spellpower}</c> and self for <skillcolor>{selfhealing}</c> of your spell power.
Launch a projectile that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <blood>Leech</c>.
Deals damage and drains life when the effect ends.

Launch a projectile that curses enemy hit and inflicts <blood>Leech</c>. The curse deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and drains <skillcolor>{drain}</c> health after <skillcolor>{delay}s</c>.

Dash towards input direction and elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Your next primary attack heals you for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your maximum health and triggers a nova of blood that deals <skillcolor>{novadamage}</c> magic damage, drains <skillcolor>{noveleech}</c> health and inflicts <blood>Leech</c>.

Block melee and projectile attacks for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Blocking an attack charges the effect up to <skillcolor>{count}</c> times. Unleash a blood nova dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage per charge, inflicting <blood>Leech</c> and knocking enemies back while healing allies for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your spellpower per charge when the effect ends.

<blood>Leech</c> the lifeforce from your enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Physical attacks restore <skillcolor>{leechfactor}</c> of damage dealt against <blood>Leeched</c> enemies.\n\nHeal self for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your maximum health when a target affected by <blood>Leech</c> perishes.
Mastery of blood is the innate power residing in all vampires. The sanguine arts pull the lifeforce from your enemies, turning their blood and pain into your nourishment.
Increases the amount of health recovered when using Blood Mend by <skillcolor>{factor}</c>.
Reduces the rate at which you lose blood over time by <skillcolor>{factor}</c>.
Increases the effective healing from attacking targets affected by <blood>Leech</c> by an additional <skillcolor>{factor}</c>.
The eruption hit consumes <blood>Leech</c> dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage.
The initial impact inflicts a fading snare lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Increases healing of the initial hit by <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c>.
Removes all negative effects from self and nearby allies on the initial hit.

<skillcolor>Recast</c> to conjure a lesser blood fountain. The initial hit heals allies for <skillcolor>{InitHealing}%</c>, the eruption hit heals for <skillcolor>{ImpactHealing}%</c> and deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage.
Increases healing of the eruption impact by <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c>.
The eruption hit knocks enemies back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters.
The eruption hit increases target ally movement speed by <skillcolor>{MovementSpeedModifier}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Increases physical damage output by <skillcolor>{PhysicalDamage}%</c> during the effect.
Killing an enemy unit during the effect heals you for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your maximum health.
Shield self and nearby allies for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
Inflict a fading snare on enemies hit lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Throw up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> extra daggers when triggered.
When triggered, consumes <blood>Leech</c> from up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> targets, healing self for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your maximum health per target.
When triggered, consumes <blood>Leech</c> from up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> targets, reducing cooldown by <skillcolor>{CooldownReduction}s</c> per target.
When triggered your next primary attack used within <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage.
When triggered heals self for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your spell power.
Instantly trigger the effect when struck unleashing the blood nova with the power of <skillcolor>{Count}</c> charges.
Turn invisible during the immaterial duration.
Throw up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> daggers towards nearby enemies when triggered, each dagger dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c>.
Increases damage done by each bat by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c>.
Explodes when reaching maximum distance dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c> on nearby enemies.
Hitting the same target with all bats inflicts a <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> stun.
The first hit inflicts <blood>Lesser Vampiric Curse</c> dealing <skillcolor>{damage}%</c> damage and leeching <skillcolor>{Leech}%</c> health after <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Bounces towards an additional target after first hit dealing <skillcolor>{Modifier}%</c> of the initial damage or healing. Can bounce back towards owner.
Hitting a target affected by <blood>Leech</c> heals self for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your maximum health.
Hitting a target affected by <blood>Leech</c> deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage.
Explodes on hit dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c> on nearby enemies.
Forks into two lesser projectiles on hit, each projectile dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c>.
Hitting a target affected by <blood>Leech</c> heals self for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your maximum health.

Inflicts <blood>Vampiric Curse</c> dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and leeching <skillcolor>{Leech}%</c> health after <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> but reduces damage done by the initial impact by <skillcolor>{DamageReduction}%</c>.
Increases damage dealt to the target by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> while the curse lasts.
Triggers a nova of blood dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c> on nearby enemies when the effect ends.
Reduces target movement speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> while the curse lasts.
Next primary attack inflicts a fading snare lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Next primary attack conjures a nova of blood dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <blood>Leech</c> on nearby enemies.
Hitting an enemy affected by <blood>Leech</c> increases your physical damage output by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Smash the ground, causing a shockwave that erupts, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage in a line and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.
Launch <skillcolor>4</c> Chaos projectiles that deal <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage on direct hit, <skillcolor>{damage2}</c> magic damage to enemies in an area and inflicts <chaos>Ignite</c>.
Increases damage done by your chaos bolt.

Block melee and projectile attacks in front of you for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Blocking an attack charges the barrier up to <skillcolor>{count}</c> times. Unleash a chaos bolt dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c> when the effect ends. The projectile deals <skillcolor>{bonusdamage}</c> additional damage per charge.\n\n<skillcolor>Recast</c> during the effect to launch the projectile early.

Charge forward and grab an enemy dealing <skillcolor>{HitDamage}</c> magic damage, and push them in front of you. Deals <skillcolor>{AreaDamage}</c> magic area damage, inflicts <chaos>Ignite</c> and inflicts a <skillcolor>Stun</c> lasting <skillcolor>{StunDuration}s</c> when reaching maximum range or when colliding with another enemy or object.

Boost a target ally or self applying a fading haste that increases movement speed by <skillcolor>{hastefactor}</c>, attack speed by <skillcolor>{attackspeed}</c> and physical attacks inflict <chaos>Ignite</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.
Shower an area with <skillcolor>{count}</c> chaos meteors over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> dealing up to <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.

Dash towards input direction and elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Your next primary attack heals you for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your maximum health, inflicts <chaos>Ignite</c> and allows you to <skillcolor>recast</c> the ability to dash once more.\n\nYour illusion explode, dealing <skillcolor>{damage2}</c> magic damage to nearby enemies and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c> when the effect ends.
Summon an orb that explodes at the target location, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage, inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c> and pulls enemies towards the center.

Disappear from this plane of existance and appear again at target location in a violent explosion dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage, inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c> and pulling enemies towards the center of the vortex.\n\nGain <chaos>Power Surge</c> when appearing again.
Launch <skillcolor>2</c> Chaos Bolts in a sequence that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <chaos>Ignite</c>.

<chaos>Ignite</c> your enemies with chaos flames, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.\n\nTriggers an explosion that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage when a target affected by <chaos>Ignite</c> perishes.
The flames of the void cannot be quenched. Their crackling energies incinerate your enemies and push you beyond your limits with surges of void power.
Increases the effect of Ultimate spells, increasing damage, healing, shield effects and minion damage by <skillcolor>{factor1}</c>.
<chaos>Ignite</c> lasts <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> longer and deals damage one additional time.
The initial wave inflicts a fading snare on enemies hit lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Knocks nearby enemies back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters on cast.
Launch three lesser projectiles in an arc instead of one when recasting, each lesser projectile deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> of the original damage.
Explodes on hit dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c> on nearby enemies.
Projectiles forks into two lesser projectiles on hit, each projectile dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.
When fully charged, gain a lesser <chaos>Power Surge</c> lasting for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
A charged chaos bolt stuns target on hit for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Hitting a different target with the second projectile deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> additional damage.
Shield target for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
Increases physical damage output by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> during the effect.
<skillcolor>Recast</c> to consume the effect triggering an explosion dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.
Lethal attacks during the effect increases duration by <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>. Can trigger up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times.
An additional meteor strikes the center of the location dealing <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> damage when the effect ends.
The first meteor engulf the area in fire dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times to enemies in the area.
There is a <skillcolor>30%</c> chance to spawn a greater meteor dealing <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> additional damage in a <skillcolor>30%</c> bigger radius.
Inflicts a fading snare lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when an illusion explodes.
Increases damage done when an illusion explodes by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c>.
Spawns a second illusion when recasting dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> of the original damage.
Flames engulf the area dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times to enemies in the area.
Spawns <skillcolor>{Count}</c> exploding fragments dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <chaos>Ignite</c>.
Increases the rate charges recharge by <skillcolor>{ChargeUpRate}%</c>.

Dash towards input direction and elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Your next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{bonusdamage}</c> bonus damage and inflicts <blood>Vampiric Curse</c>.

Leap into the air and strike down at target location, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage. A nova of frost erupts from the impact location that <frost>Freezes</c> any enemy hit for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.\n\nEnemy vampires are frozen for <skillcolor>{vampireduration}s</c>.

Block melee and projectile attacks in front of you for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Conjures up to <skillcolor>{count}</c> frost spikes dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c> when the barrier is struck.\n\n<skillcolor>Recast</c> during the effect to conjure a cone of cold dealing <skillcolor>{conedamage}</c> magical damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c>.

Block melee and projectile attacks for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Blocking an attack triggers an ice nova that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicts a <skillcolor>{freezeduration}s</c> <frost>Freeze</c>. Gain a shield absorbing up to <skillcolor>{shieldvalue}</c> of your spell power for <skillcolor>{shieldduration}s</c> when this effect triggers.
Launch a projectile dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <frost>Freeze</c> lasting <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

Launch a projectile that that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage. The projectile explodes upon impact, inflicting <frost>Chill</c> on nearby enemies. Hitting a <frost>Chilled</c> enemy <frost>Freezes</c> it for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

Channel a wave of frost over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c>. Conjures a cone of cold at the end of the effect <frost>Freezing</c> any target hit for <skillcolor>{freezeduration}s</c>.

Conjure a frost storm that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage and pulls enemies towards the center. The storm rages on for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>, dealing <skillcolor>{dps}</c> magic damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c> on all enemies.

Apply a shield to target ally or self that shields the target for <skillcolor>{absorb}</c> of your spell power. The effect leaves a frost trail behind that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage every <skillcolor>{tick}s</c> and inflicts <frost>Chill</c> on enemies that pass through it.

Turn target ally or self into solid ice rendering them unable to move or act for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. The ice shields for <skillcolor>{absorb}</c> of your spell power, grants immunity to crowd control effects and heals up to <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of maximum health while active.\n\nThe effect can be canceled by <skillcolor>interrupting</c> it.

Turn target ally or self into solid ice for up to <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> and summon a frost vortex. The ice block shields target for <skillcolor>{absorb}</c> of your spell power, grants immunity to crowd control effects and heals up to <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of target maximum health. \n\nThe vortex initially deals <skillcolor>{initdamage}</c> magic damage and inflicts <frost>Chill</c>. The vortex deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> additional damage over the duration of the effect.

Conjure a nova of ice at the target location dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> magic damage. The nova radiates outward inflicting <frost>Chill</c>. Hitting a <frost>Chilled</c> enemy <frost>Freezes</c> it for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.\n
Creates frost spikes at target location dealing {damage} magic damage and inflicts Chill on enemies hit.

Dash towards input direction and elude nearby enemies for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>. Your next primary attack heals you for <skillcolor>{healing}</c> of your maximum health, shields you for <skillcolor>{shield}</c> of your spell power and inflicts <frost>Chill</c>.
<frost>Chill</c> your enemies to their core, slowing their movement speed by <skillcolor>{slowfactor}</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.

<frost>Freezes</c> your enemies solid, making them unable to move or act.

Deals <skillcolor>{frostdamage}</c> magic damage, inflicts <frost>Chill</c> and staggers the target for <skillcolor>{staggerduration}s</c> if the target is immune to <frost>Freeze</c>.

<i>Vampires are frozen for <skillcolor>half duration</c>.
Command the frigid winds of blizzards and hailstorms, slowly freezing your foes into frosted sculptures of horrid cold or impaling them on spikes of ice.
Amplifies the effect of all shields applied to you by <skillcolor>{factor}</c>.
The shield absorbs an additional <skillcolor>{Absorb}%</c> of your spell power.
When triggered increases movement speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> while the shield last.
Pierces up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> targets dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> reduced damage per target.
Absorbing an attack increases your spell power by <skillcolor>{SpellPower}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>. Effect stacks up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times.
Cone of cold knocks targets back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters on hit.
Hitting a <frost>chilled</c> or <frost>frozen</c> target with the cone of cold shields you for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
The frost impact blast deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage to surrounding enemies.
Send a wave of frost at the end of the effect travelling <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters and inflicting <frost>chill</c>. Hitting a <frost>chilled</c> enemey <frost>freezes</c> it.
Knocks enemies back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters at the end of the effect.
Heal self for <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> of damage done.
Shields self for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power when activated.
Absorbs an additional <skillcolor>{Absorb}%</c> of your spell power.
Inflicts <frost>Chill</c> on enemy attackers dealing physical damage to you.
The nova shields self and allies for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
Increases the radius of the direct impact by <skillcolor>{Radius}%</c>.
<skillcolor>Recast</c> to conjure a lesser ice nova dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> of the original damage.
Next primary attack conjures a nova of frost dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c> on nearby enemies.
Illusion explodes in a nova of ice dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c> on nearby enemies.
Increases shield absorb amount by <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
Inflicts a fading snare on enemies hit lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Knock targets back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters on hit.
Increases damage of next primary attack by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c>.

Hitting a target affected by <chaos>Ignite</c> engulfs the target in agonizing flames dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and healing self for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your spell power <skillcolor>{Ticks}</c> times.
Consumes <chaos>Ignite</c> and triggers an explosion dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> area damage.
Next primary attack consumes <chaos>Ignite</c> triggering the chaos explosion effect instantly.
Consumes <chaos>Ignite</c> increasing your movement speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>. Effect stacks up to <skillcolor>2</c> times.
Next primary attack consumes <chaos>Ignite</c> increasing your movement speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>. Effect stacks up to <skillcolor>2</c> times.
Removes all negative effects from self when cast.
Conjure a nova of ice inflicting <frost>Chill</c> or consuming <frost>Chill</c>, inflicting <frost>Freeze</c> lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when the effect ends.
Next primary attack consumes <frost>Chill</c> and inflicts <frost>Freeze</c> lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Cone of cold consumes <frost>Chill</c> and inflicts <frost>Freeze</c> lasting <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Increases damage done to <frost>chilled</c> and <frost>frozen</c> targets by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c>.
Increases <frost>freeze</c> duration by <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when hitting a <frost>chilled</c> target.
Hitting a <frost>chilled</c> or <frost>frozen</c> target shields you for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power.
Hitting a <frost>chilled</c> or <frost>frozen</c> target shatters the projectile into <skillcolor>{Count}</c> splinters, each dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and inflicting <frost>Chill</c>.
When triggered, charges target's weapon with arctic energy. Next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage and inflicts <frost>Chill</c>.
Hitting a target affected by <illusion>Weaken</c> grants you a shield absorbing <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> damage based on your spell power stacking up to <skillcolor>3</c> times.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> from enemies near the destination to gain a shield absorbing <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> damage based on your spell power stacking up to <skillcolor>3</c> times.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> from up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> targets, reducing cooldown by <skillcolor>{CooldownReduction}s</c> per target.
Consumes <illusion>Weaken</c> to spawn a wisp healing self or ally for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your spell power.

Hitting an enemy affected by <illusion>Weaken</c> with your next primary attack grants a shield absorbing <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> damage based on your spell power stacking up to <skillcolor>3</c> times.
Increases the duration of the effect by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c>.
Increases movement speed when channeling by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c>.
Increases projectile range and speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c>.
The recast attack knocks targets back <skillcolor>{Range}</c> meters on hit.
Absorbing an attack reduces cooldown by <skillcolor>{CooldownReduction}s</c> from up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> attacks.
Consumes <storm>Static</c> to stun the target for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Consumes <storm>Static</c> to stun enemies for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when the orb explodes.
Consumes <storm>Static</c> to charge your weapon up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times. Next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage per stack and inflicts <storm>Static</c>.
When triggered charge your weapon up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times. Next primary attack deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage per stack and inflicts <storm>Static</c>.
Hitting an enemy already affected by <unholy>Condemn</c> inflicts <unholy>Agony</c> which deals <skillcolor>{DamagePerTick}%</c> damage <skillcolor>{Ticks}</c> times over the duration.

Next primary attack inflicts <unholy>Agony</c> if the enemy was already affected by <unholy>Condemn</c>. <unholy>Agony</c> deals <skillcolor>{DamagePerTick}%</c> damage <skillcolor>{Ticks}</c> times over the duration.
Hitting a <unholy>condemned</c> target summons a skeleton mage with <skillcolor>{BonusStats}%</c> extra health when the target perishes.
Striking a <unholy>condemned</c> target summons a skeleton mage with <skillcolor>{BonusStats}%</c> extra health when the target perishes.

Increases Physical Critical Chance by <skillcolor>{attribute}</c>. Critical Strikes leech <skillcolor>{factor1}</c> health and there is a <skillcolor>{factor2}</c> chance to spawn a <blood>Blood Orb</c> when killing a target affected by <blood>Leech</c>.
Increases Physical Critical Chance by <skillcolor>{attribute}</c>. Physical Critical Strikes grants <skillcolor>{factor1}</c> increased Attack Speed for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.
Deal <skillcolor>{factor1}</c> increased physical damage to enemies affected by <blood>Leech</c> and boost the effect of your current blood type by <skillcolor>{attribute}</c>.
Increases Primary Attack Leech by <skillcolor>{attribute}</c> and increases damage against V Bloods by <skillcolor>{factor1}</c>.
Increases Spell Cooldown Rate by <skillcolor>{attribute}</c>. Ignite deals <skillcolor>{factor1}</c> increased damage and <chaos>Chaos Explosions</c> ignites enemies hit.
Increases Weapon Cooldown Rate by <skillcolor>{attribute}</c> and Weapon Charge Gain  by <skillcolor>{factor1}</c>.
Increases Weapon Skill Power by <skillcolor>{attribute}</c> and Weapon Skill Leech by <skillcolor>{factor}</c>.
Deal <skillcolor>{factor1}</c> increased spell damage to enemies affected by <chaos>Ignite</c> and <chaos>Ignite</c> heals you for up to <skillcolor>{factor2}</c> of your spell power.
Increases Maximum Health by <skillcolor>{attribute}</c> and reduces damage taken by <skillcolor>{factor1}</c> when affected by a crowd control effect.

Heals all allied skeletons you dash through by <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of their maximum health and reset their lifetime.
Inflicts <unholy>Condemn</c> on all enemies struck by your next attack.
Striking an enemy summons <skillcolor>{Count}</c> skeleton warrior.
Striking an enemy summons a <skillcolor>Skeleton Mage</c> instead of a Skeleton Warrior.
Increases damage done by the recast attack by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c>.
Melee attackers take <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage when striking the barrier.
Empower allied skeletons hit by the recast increasing their damage output by <skillcolor>{Empower}%</c> for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
Absorbing a projectile heals you for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your spell power.
Shields allied skeletons hit by the recast for <skillcolor>{Shield}%</c> of your spell power. The shield last for <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.
<skillcolor>{Chance}%</c> chance to spawn a Skeleton Mage instead of a Skeleton Warrior when triggered.
Make a gesture to indicate for someone to approach.
Show your respect with a formal gesture.
Rest your legs for a moment.
Dismount your horse by a quick athletic jump.
Dismount your horse by jumping high into the air.
Increases the movement speed while mounted, slowing down will cancel the effect.
Lower your guard and allow other vampires to drink your blood. Splits your blood pool in half as you share your blood and blood type with another vampire.
Enter a thrusting state for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>, knockbacking and incapacitates enemies you run into as well as run through any minor destructable objects.
Turn into a shadow, leap and gain a burst of speed. Can be used to leap through most types of solid objects.
Turn into a spectral wolf, leap and gain a short burst of speed. Can be used to leap through most types of solid objects.
Consume {blood} liters of blood per second to recover {healing} of your maximum health.
Allows you to instantly recognise blood type and blood quality of nearby units.
Expose your neck allowing other vampires to consume half of your current blood pool thus replacing their own blood amount, quality and type to same as yours.
Turn into a bat and fly high into the air allowing you to cross impassable terrain. Cannot be used while carrying resources or while indoors. \n\nBeware of the sun!
Dive down and exit Bat form. Requires an eligible location; you cannot land in enemy territory, on top of buildings, or outside of the map.
Stomp the ground to deal damage to target in front of you. Can be used to <teal3>destroy massive resource objects</c> such as massive rocks.\n\n<red1>Attack level affected by equipped weapon</c>
Roar like a bear, like a vampire bear
Attack with your paw to deal damage and to knock an enemy back. Can be used to <teal3>destroy massive resource objects</c> such as massive rocks.\n\n<red1>Attack level affected by equipped weapon</c>

Turn into a powerful creature able to destroy massive resources. Increases your resistances by <skillcolor>{resistance}</c> and reduces damage taken by <skillcolor>{damageabsorb}</c>. You regenerate health slightly quicker while in this form.
<teal1>Press and Hold</c> to release any target under your control killing it.
Send the dominated target to the nearest empty prison cell within your empire.\n\n<teal2>Can only be used if an empty prison cell exist.</c>
Channel a spell that allows you to dominate lifeforms with an active blood type. Deals magic damage over time and puts the target under your control once they go below <skillcolor>30%</c> health.
Recall your companion teleporting it to your location. This action also revives and heals your companion if it has perished.
<teal1>Press and Hold</c> to release your companion, permanently vanquishing it from existence. \n\n<red1>This action cannot be undone.</c>
Channel a spell that allows you to turn a horse into an eternal companion. A companion can be recalled to your location and can be resurrected. You may only have one active companion at a time.
Grants you commanding abilities allowing you to turn horses into your eternal companions. You cannot use normal spells while using Subdue.
You are dominating the mind of an enemy. Bring it to a servant coffin to convert it into a vampire servant or find a way to imprison it.
Grants you the power to dominate the mind of lifeforms with an active blood type. You cannot use normal spells while using Dominate.
Hold to cast to transform back into Vampire form ending the siege.
Slam the ground to launch a shockwave dealing <skillcolor>{damage} siege damage</c>. Can be used to break walls & structures.
Apply a shield to nearby allies shielding them for <skillcolor>{shield}</c> of your spell power. Lasts for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.
Perform a mighty fist slam dealing <skillcolor>{damage} siege damage</c> and inflicting a <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> stun. Can be used to break walls & structures.
Perform a mighty stomp dealing <skillcolor>{damage} siege damage</c> in an area and knocking enemies back. Can be used to break walls & structures.
Perform a mighty swing dealing <skillcolor>{damage} siege damage</c>. Can be used to break walls & structures.
Turn into a human allowing you to sneak around unnoticed in human settlements. Be careful though, the strong-willed can see through your disguise. While in human form you can interact with traders.
Burrow into the ground and move unseen for a short duration before emerging.
Turn into a small rat and blend into the environment making it harder for enemies to detect you. Taking damage breaks the effect.
Burrow into the ground, avoiding the sun and hiding from enemies. Taking damage breaks the effect.
Turn into a creepy spider that is able to burrow into the ground to hide from enemies and to avoid the burning sun.
Turn into a toad able to jump high into the air. Taking damage breaks the effect.
Howl like a wolf, like a vampire wolf
Turn into a swift creature increasing your movement speed and allowing you to leap through solid objects. Taking damage breaks the effect.
Attack from your mount dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage.

Fire a projectile that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage on hit. Consumes <skillcolor>Marked</c> dealing <skillcolor>{bonusdamage}</c> bonus damage and increasing your attack speed by <skillcolor>{attackspeed}</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>, this effect stacks up to <skillcolor>{stacks}</c> times.
Perform a combo of melee attacks dealing <skillcolor>{damage1}</c>/<skillcolor>{damage2}</c>/<skillcolor>{damage3}</c> physical damage.
Cast a projectile dealing {damage} spell damage and inflict a {amplify} damage amplification to the target for {duration}s.

A pulse of necrotic energy that damages enemies and heals allies in a small area.

It heals allies for {healing} of your spellpower and {healingdot} over {duration}s, allies deal {damageamp} more damage for the duration. 

It deals {damage} spell damage to enemies in the area and inflicts a {snareduration}s fading snare if they are affected by an amplify buff.

Summon a Skeleton Berserker to aid you in battle for {duration}s. Its attacks deal {damage} of your spell power.

When summoned, it deals {summondamage} spell damage and inflicts a {snareduration}s fading snare to enemies around it.

When it dies, it reduces the cooldown of this spell by {cooldown}s.

Dash forward and strike the first enemy dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}</c> physical damage. Enter a state of frenzy that increases your movement speed by <skillcolor>{MovementSpeed}</c> and attack speed by <skillcolor>{attackspeed}</c> for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> on a successful hit.

Throw two axes in the shape of an X. Each hit deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage and slows the enemy for <skillcolor>{slowduration}s</c>. Hitting the enemy where both axes intersect inflicts a <skillcolor>{stunduration}s</c> incapacitate.
Toss two additional axes in a wider cone, each additional axe deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage. All axes inflict <blood>Leech</c> but may no longer inflict <skillcolor>incapacitate</c>.
Vault towards the cursor and cleave enemies dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage and inflicting <skillcolor>Puncture</c>.
Become immaterial for a short duration while keeping your ability to cast spells.

Leap to target location, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage, inflicting <skillcolor>Puncture</c> and a <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> incapacitate. 

You bounce off enemies toward your aim direction. Missing an enemy will cause you to stick to the ground for a short duration.

Perform a combo of melee attacks dealing <skillcolor>{damage1}</c>/<skillcolor>{damage2}</c>/<skillcolor>{damage3}</c> physical damage. The third attack inflicts <skillcolor>Puncture</c> stacking up to <skillcolor>{stacks}</c> times.\n\nTrigger a rupture dealing <skillcolor>{rupturedamage}</c> damage to the target and <skillcolor>{ruptureareadamage}</c> damage to nearby enemies upon reaching maximum stacks.
Hold to charge a dash forward slicing everything along your path.
Consuming <skillcolor>Puncture</c> heals self for <skillcolor>{Healing}%</c> of your spell power.
Primary attack speed increased by <skillcolor>{factor}</c> per stack.

Fire a salvo of <skillcolor>{count}</c> bolts into the air that rains down on your enemies dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage each in an area, inflicts <skillcolor>Marked</c> and a <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> fading snare.

Fire a quick bolt that deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage, interrupts attacks, inflicts <skillcolor>Marked</c> and inflicts a <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> fading snare. The bolt splits into two upon hit.
Fire <skillcolor>{Count}</c> additional bolts and each bolt inflicts <illusion>Weaken</c>.
Consume <illusion>Weaken</c> to deal <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage and inflict a <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> fear.

Inflict a <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> fading snare and release all nearby daggers that are stuck in the ground. Each dagger that returns grants one dagger stack and reduces the cooldown of Rain of Daggers by <skillcolor>{cooldownreduction}s</c>.

Leap into the air and throw <skillcolor>{amount}</c> daggers in front of you, each dagger dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage and inflicting a <skillcolor>{snareduration}s</c> fading snare. Daggers remain on the ground for <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>.
The number of daggers that will be activated when using your primary attack.

Throw up to <skillcolor>{count}</c> daggers, each dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage. Hitting an enemy or a solid object causes the dagger to stick to the ground.\n\nGain one dagger stack every <skillcolor>{chargeduration}s</c>.
<skillcolor>{chance}%</c> chance to gain one stack of <illusion>Phantasm</c> for each returning dagger.
Inflicts <illusion>Weaken</c> and deals <skillcolor>{Damage1}%</c> bonus damage for each stack of <illusion>Phantasm</c>.

Leap into the air, deal damage and slow all nearby enemies when landing. Grants frenzy or consumes frenzy to deal additional damage and knock enemies back further.

Fire <skillcolor>{count}</c> bullets in a cone over <skillcolor>{duration}s</c>, each bullet deals <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage and knocks the target back.

Enter a state of <skillcolor>invisibility</c>, increasing movement speed by <skillcolor>{movespeed}</c> for <skillcolor>{lifetimeduration}s</c>. Increases damage done by <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> and movement speed by <skillcolor>{Factor}%</c> but reduces camouflage duration by <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> and incapacitate duration by <skillcolor>{Stunduration}s</c>
Next hit Consumes <storm>Static</c> dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> bonus damage.

Inflicts <blood>Vampiric Curse</c> on hit but reduces stun duration by <skillcolor>{ReducedDuration}s</c>. <blood>Vampiric Curse</c> deals <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and leeches <skillcolor>{Leech}%</c> health after <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c>.

The duration of <skillcolor>Whirlwind</c> increases by <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> when killing an enemy and hits inflict <unholy>Condemn</c>. \nDuration can be increased up to <skillcolor>{Count}</c> times.
Channel lightning through your rod, summoning 3 lightning strikes over {duration}s that deal {damage} magic damage in a small area.
Launch a piercing projectile that deals {damage} magic damage on hit. Reduces damage for each subsequent hit by {reduction}.
Transform into lightning, traveling a short distance forward. Hitting an enemy deals {damage} damage, knocks them back and inflicts a {duration}s stun.

Toss your weapon towards target location, dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage and inflicting a <skillcolor>{snareduration}s</c> fading snare in an area.

Deals <skillcolor>{damage}%</c> bonus damage to <frost>Chilled</c> or <frost>Frozen</c> enemies.
Leap towards the cursor and swing your whip around you dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage, knocking enemies back and inflicting a <skillcolor>{duration}s</c> fading snare.
Strike in a line dealing <skillcolor>{linedamage}</c> physical damage and inflicting a <skillcolor>{lineduration}s</c> entangle.

Attack from your mount dealing <skillcolor>{damage}</c> physical damage to the first enemy hit. Deals <skillcolor>{splashdamage}</c> additional physical damage in a small radius at the tip of the whip.\n

Inflicts a <skillcolor>{Duration}s</c> stun instead of entangle and causes a firey explosion at the impact location dealing <skillcolor>{Damage}%</c> damage and <legendary>Igniting</c> the area.

Increases your attack speed and physical power.

100% chance to Critical Strike on next attack.

By accessing a <teal2>Level {level} Enemy Castle Heart</c> you may spend <skillcolor>Level {level} Castle Keys</c> to trigger different actions.

<teal2>Disable Defences</c>
Spend <skillcolor>{countdisable} Key</c> to disable enemy walls, doors, waygates and coffins.
Available on <skillcolor>standard PvP</c> Settings

<teal2>Destroy Castle</c>
Spend <skillcolor>{countdestroy} Key</c> to permanently destroy the castle.
Available on <skillcolor>merciless PvP</c> Settings

<teal2>Claim Castle</c>
Spend <skillcolor>{countclaim} Keys</c> to seize control of the castle.
Available on <skillcolor>merciless PvP</c> Settings

By accessing a <teal2>Level 1 Enemy Castle Heart</c> you can spend <teal2>1 Bone Castle key</c> to destroy the castle or spend <teal2>3 Bone Castle keys</c> to seize control of the castle.\n\n<red1>This item can only be used on servers that allow destruction and/or seizing of enemy castles.</c>

By accessing a <teal2>Level 2 Enemy Castle Heart</c> you can spend <teal2>1 Copper Castle key</c> to destroy the castle or spend <teal2>3 Copper Castle keys</c> to seize control of the castle.\n\n<red1>This item can only be used on servers that allow destruction and/or seizing of enemy castles.</c>

By accessing a <teal2>Level 3 Enemy Castle Heart</c> you can spend <teal2>1 Iron Castle key</c> to destroy the castle or spend <teal2>3 Iron Castle keys</c> to seize control of the castle.\n\n<red1>This item can only be used on servers that allow destruction and/or seizing of enemy castles.</c>

By accessing a <teal2>Level 4 or Level 5 Enemy Castle Heart</c> you can spend <teal2>1 Golden Castle key</c> to destroy the castle or spend <teal2>3 Golden Castle keys</c> to seize control of the castle.\n\n<red1>This item can only be used on servers that allow destruction and/or seizing of enemy castles.</c>

The effect wears off over time when not exposed.

Also makes you smell bad, increasing the range which enemies detect you!

A dangerous spell-caster in tune with the more ephemeral qualities of nature. Mairwyn speaks to the winds, which whisper for change, chaos, and destruction. However, she seems content to only massacre those who wander too close to her Grove.

Finn is a legendary fisherman who hails from the rocky shores of Silverlight Hills. Caught fishing in the Church of Luminance’s “sacred” waters, he was set to be executed by live burial at sea. The fisherman emerged from the depths, mysterious and miraculously alive, and went into hiding in the safety of the lawless lands of the Farbane Woods.

An unparalleled genius in the explosive arts. Unfortunately for Grayson, this chaotic psychopath is far too useful to get rid of at providing and mixing destructive materials. He’ll burn down his entire camp just to take you with him, laughing all the while.

An adept but undisciplined archer, she lets her arrows fly and trusts that fate knows where to take them, and it works. Lidia is a force of chaos that cannot be contained, and the bandit king is happy to let her do as she likes as long as it benefits him.

A cold-hearted bandit lieutenant, she oversees the animal husbandry and leather tanning camp in Farbane. Once a member of the Dunley militia, she was removed from her position for her brutal battlefield decision-making. Aside from being a crack shot, her enchanted arrows rain down icy death.

A lieutenant of the bandit forces charged with looking over the logging camp. Just because he’s an expert woodworker doesn’t mean he doesn’t know his way around a crossbow, though. He didn’t rise up in the bandit ranks for nothing.

A brutal mining foreman, just as adept at crushing stone as he is crushing bone. Not even his incredible eye for recovering and refining metals was enough to stop him from getting run out of civilised society. His violent rage makes a fine motivator for the miners.

The ‘King’ of the bandits, once heralded as a hero of the common people in Dunley. His lack of proper reverence for the Church of Luminance saw him driven into Farbane, where his prowess in battle earned the respect of the banditry and, eventually, a place as their champion and king. He may have been a good man, once.
Unit that yields <teal1>Grave Dust</c>, chance for <teal1>Scourgestone</c> and <teal1>Spectral Dust</c>.

A legendary Vampire from the age of Dracula who was reawakened by the call of the Immortal King. Known for his ferocity on the battlefield against the forces of the church and rival Vampire alike, he has more than earned his place as the Night Champion of the Legion of Noctum. His presence at the heart of Dracula's Demise suggests that operations there are of vital importance to Dracula's plans.

A mad cultist, too far gone to be really intelligible. The malevolent being they serve pushes them to desecrate all things, with little regard for practicality. They wear a rotting pig’s head as a decorative mask.

There are few creatures on the face of Vardoran as ancient as Leandra. Mysterious and surrounded with shadow magic and undeath, it is said that when Dracula fell, and the poisonous blood rains soaked Vardoran, she stood willingly in the deadly downpour. Some say she embraced the dark power of that corruption and made it her own. Today she serves as High Priestess of the Cult of the Damned.

One would not expect a simple craftsman to be so vicious in battle, but none represent the Venom Blades’ endless thirst for havoc and consumption better than Stavros. From carving the trees with runes of corruption to harvesting the Venom Sap those trees produce, he works with a cold glee. Whether it be bark or flesh, every cut of his knife is a show of his devotion to the great witch Megara. Like any Venom Blade, he loves and fears his queen in equal measure, revering her as a goddess and looking to her for higher purpose.

Jakira was not always a member of the Venom Blades. Like many, she first resisted their onslaught, standing against the great witch Megara and her raiders as they descended upon her homeland and consumed its forests. A master duelist, Jakira always believed in strength, and now she serves the strong with unflinching loyalty. Like many Venom Blades, she’s mixed her skills with their corrupted magic, alchemy, and brutal techniques, always looking for new ways to prove herself and earn her place at her masters' side. Despite her stealthy nature, this cocky huntress always warns her prey just before she strikes.

An energetic, maniacal alchemist with a famously resilient constitution. Lucile obsesses over creating the perfect Venom Sap brew for any occasion. She credits her brilliance to her Queen, Megara, who she claims delivers her divine inspiration. That Inspiration just so happens to strike when she forgets to switch out the filters in her protective face mask.

There was once a small village of warriors, a place of little significance. When the great witch Megara appeared the villagers reacted with suspicion, gathering their forces to stand against her. Megara gave them a display of power that inspired such terror it crushed all hope of resistance, driving them to their knees. “I am your Queen! The greatest half of you will become my first subjects, and will walk by my side. Come dusk, each of you that are holding the heart of one of your neighbors will earn your place.” Those who obeyed became the first Venom Blades, worthy of receiving the secret of Venom Sap. This fuels their war effort, but more importantly, the great witch herself.
A blacksmith defends your castle against intruders and unlocks new recipes on the Anvil and the Furnace. You only need one blacksmith in your castle.

A fanatical servant of the Church of Luminance, his blind faith in the Light makes him the perfect candidate for Overseer of the Silver Mines. He is willing to look past the vile actions of the church, and even enforce them if it’s in the interest of what he believes is the greater good. Even if it means doing something he might never condone, such as forced labor, or exiling his beloved daughter.

Once a loyal warrior in the Legion of Noctum. So dedicated was his fanaticism that upon Dracula’s death to the hands of the Church of Luminance, the warrior severed his shield-bearing arm in an act of shame. In a delirious haze, he wandered into the wilderness of the Cursed Forest expecting to die. The corruption within gave him not death, however, but something much worse.

Cursed with eternal life and servitude to the Cult of the Damned, Cyril has little desire to perform his duties. However, having been traded to the Cult before he had even been born, this tortured life is all he knows. Resigned to his fate, he does still take some small joy in inflicting his pain on others.

This old survivalist sought to explore the Cursed Forest, despite knowing its dangers. As the curse began to cloud his mind, he found ways to fight against it. With his cloak and a helpful little wisp he’d captured in a lantern, his strange magical defense prevented the curse from taking full control. Though it was too late to prevent his mind from falling to tatters, he still does what he does best… survive.

This mother bear is said to be ancient. Rumor has it that she wears a scar from every Bandit King that has ever lived, a rite of passage for the position. Her life stands as testament to the fact that no bandit leader has ever done well enough to finish the job.

Farmers try to be diligent in keeping their pest problems under control, as legend says that any place too infested might find themselves visited by Nibbles. No one is quite sure how it gets in, but they know it by the stench of rotting flesh and its carnivorous appetite.
A giant deadly putrid rat. The blood of this rat could be useful...

When the Church of Luminance first discovered the abilities granted by the blood rain, they took it as a blessing from the Light, incidentally masking the truth of Dracula’s influence. Christina is one such faithful servant of the church. This cruel disciplinarian takes her continued mastery of Light as evidence that her torturous methods of enforcing her beliefs are a necessary tenet of her faith, and she very much enjoys proving her righteousness.

A stalwart champion of law and order in Dunley, it’s his mission to protect the common people with his chilling gifts. Some say his methods have been getting more harsh and violent ever since his sister was banished.

The result of a long line of earth speakers, Terah resides up in the solitude of the mountains among sparkling gem veins and rugged boulders. Despite her stoic appearance and demeanour, communing with the spirits of nature has driven her quite insane.
Unit that yields <teal1>Bones</c>, chance for <teal1>Grave Dust</c>.
Unit that yields <teal1>Rugged Hides</c>, chance for low grade <teal1>Seeds</c>

A true artist with a deep love for the process of creation. She thinks of herself much like she thinks of her glass. It is beautiful and practical, chaotic and tame, strong and yet delicate. In the same way, her style of glassblowing is methodical and daring. While she is a master of her craft, she wears many savage burn scars for her haphazard approach.

The trusted Right Hand of Doctor Henry Blackbrew, Voltatia is responsible for the maintenance and protection of the entire electric pipeline of Gloomrot, providing the region with their much needed energy supply. A stern professional and born leader, Voltatia operates with psychotic efficiency, and has little emotional desire beyond keeping The Doctor’s operation running smoothly.

The most dangerous of her kind, and fiercely protective of her tribe. It’s said that the harpies are attracted to only the finest gemstones, and none has a sharper eye for quality than the matriarch herself. Wealthy folk are warned to keep their jewels out of sight if they dare travel outside the protection of Brighthaven.

The beloved head engineer of weapons at the Machine Factory, Ziva is the embodiment of perfectly delightful destruction. Truly in love with her deadly experiments, she is always at the forefront at pushing for greater means of bringing a suitably painful and spectacular death to whoever ends up on the wrong end of her unstable technology. Which end often changes from trigger pull to trigger pull.

Once a highly skilled and respected officer within the ranks of the Church of Luminance, Cassius served as a powerful paladin who led a troupe tasked with hunting down Dracula himself. His mission ended in failure, overpowered by the Immortal King and forced into servitude. With the dark influence of his sentient blade, Nightfall Edge, affecting his mind, Cassius now serves as a loyal general for the Legion of Noctum.

A creature that was once one of Dracula’s favorite pets. The monster mourned the death of its master in a blood-soaked vigil, enduring the toxic, bloody rains that followed Dracula’s death for seven days and seven nights. Unlike the many creatures that suffered under the rains, this one embraced the agony. Through its love and devotion for the tyrant king, it was able to embrace all of the hatred passed down through the downpour’s curse and become The Winged Horror.

Sir Erwin is an expert horseman, known both for his skill on horseback and unbearable company at formal events. Being generally disliked by his superiors but too skilled and devoted to the Light to exile to Farbane, he was instead sent to prepare for a grand offensive against the Cult of the Damned. Atop his fearless steed, Charger, he trains at the Dunley Horse Track, waiting for his promised troops. Surely, they’ll arrive any day now.

The head and heart of the Dunley Monastery and a true believer in the Light, Raziel is known for his persuasive sermons and harsh, fire-and-brimstone rhetoric. It is believed that his holy power is granted by his incredible righteousness, largely because he keeps saying so.

An old soldier and a veteran of many battles, Octavian is perhaps the most trusted man in all of Dunley. The militia serves him without question, and he in turn serves them to the best of his ability. Don’t let his age fool you, he’s got plenty of fight left in him.

Meredith is a true believer in the Church of Luminance. She believes her power is a gift from the Light to wield against dark forces, much as the original Paladins were given the Light to strike down Dracula and the Vampire legions. As brave as she is naive to the Church’s descent into avarice and gluttony, this holy archer is blinded by the light, focused only on her pursuit of justice at any cost.

The culmination of Doctor Henry Blackbrew’s brilliance, The Monster was to be the next step of human evolution, the ultimate machine of war. It is as powerful as Blackbrew could have ever desired but proved impossible to control. The Trancendum has done everything it can to contain The Monster, and they’ve been successful in doing so… for now.

The patriarch of a family that once held land when these swamps were adequately inhabited. Over time, the cursed land twisted them, leaving this horrible, twisted toad that only remembers its lust for gold and jewels. It jealously guards its hoard of forgotten, worthless currency.
Unit that yields <teal1>Pristine Hide</c>, spawns with a random blood type.

Summon a random lesser blood soul that yields <teal1>Stygian Shards</c> and may drop powerful jewels and ancestral weapons.

Unit that yields at least <skillcolor>{value} Flawless Gems</c> and a vast amount of <teal1>Minerals</c>.
Unit that yields <skillcolor>{minvalue} - {maxvalue} Seeds</c> of various types as well as a few <teal1>Saplings</c>.
Unit that yields at least <skillcolor>{value} Shattered Weapons</c>. Drops <rare>Rare Weapons</c>.
Unit that yields at least <skillcolor>{value} Shattered Weapons</c>. Drops <epic>Epic Weapons</c>, chance for <legendary>Unique Weapons</c>.

A legendary paladin of the Light and the oldest living member of the Church of Luminance. He has watched firsthand the descent of mankind with disinterest. A pioneer from the age of heroes, he remembers the struggle of facing down Dracula’s armies until all hope was lost. He remembers finding the light... He remembers the satisfaction of lifting his holy blade to the Immortal King, and striking down the greatest evil the world has ever seen. \n\nHe yearns to return to the days where he knew glory.

A dedicated servant of the Trancendum, Angram was an exterminator that possessed a natural cruelty and resilience unmatched by any of his peers. Like any good soldier, he gave his life for his cause… or tried to, anyway. Doctor Henry Blackbrew could not let such an asset go to waste and brought him back to life with a brutal surgery few other beings could survive. Angram lives now, at the mere cost of every last scrap of his humanity.

A brilliant, obsessive scholar that resides in an ancient family library, discovering its long-lost secrets in pursuit of a goal intuitively passed through her family’s bloodline. The culmination of generations of work is at her ink-stained fingertips… to open a way to the world of demons.

A truly impressive strategic mind in life, Kriig saw an early end for his mistaken faith in his allies. Though he was sent to an unjust grave, he was like any great mastermind, and had contingencies in place for just such an occasion. A dark deal with an entity of undeath allowed him to rise again and take his revenge. Now he serves the Cult of the Damned with renewed purpose, fully immersing himself into their enigmatic cause.
Unit that yields <teal1>Bones</c>, chance for <teal1>Scourgestone</c> and <teal1>Grave Dust</c>.

Formerly a traveling swordsman-for-hire, the good baron earned his title of Grand Sommelier after winning a tasting contest hosted by the Church of Luminance. His abilities were so extraordinary, it’s said that he can name the ingredients, their ages, and their place of origin with only a sip of brew. Though his new position offers him all the worldly goods he could desire, those who know him well suspect he may miss the taste of blood on the tip of his blade most of all.

A massive spider of legendary age and progeny. The Spider Queen resides in the twisted, web-woven depths of Cursed Forest’s winding caverns. No living creature save for her children has ever entered and lived to tell the tale.

The working arm and logistical mastermind of the bandit forces, Grayson is the backbone of their operation. As the quartermaster of a band of chaotic outlaws, murderers, and thieves, he’s the stern voice of reason that keeps their gang well fed and well equipped.
The most talented tailor in all of Vardoran. Though the legacy of Dracula’s blood runs through her veins, she has proven far more charming than dangerous.

Doctor Henry Blackbrew was once humankind’s last hope against the forces of Dracula, before the Church of Luminance came along. With their newly found faith and weapons of light, mankind turned on the Doctor for his sick methodology and pursuit of human evolution, declaring him a heretic. Banished alongside his students, he went on to found The Trancendum and began constructing a society in his image. With the help of a resource he refers to as “Blood Type E” he’s managed to maintain his youth, and keep his twisted pursuit of “progress” alive for well over 800 years.

A true politician, Azariel wormed his way to the top of the ranks of the Church of Luminance with cold, calculated social grace. Few can match his power and dedication to the Light short of Solarus the Immaculate himself, and none within the church would dare contradict his word.

Gaius was a skilled militia captain and a famous gladiator. Annoyed at Gaius popularity competing with his own, as well as that of the Church of Luminance, Raziel arranged for his defeat by way of a cursed blade. The event was devastating, and the Colosseum has been abandoned ever since… however, it is said that even today, issuing a challenge in the abandoned arena will be met with an answer.

Once a formidable swordsman and legendary graverobber, Bane was caught by the Cult of the Damned during one of his many heists. Seeing the benefit of his talent for infiltration, instead of killing him, they corrupted him into a servant of undeath. It’s said that his clandestine abilities were crucial in the capture and corruption of the Iron Mine over the Militia.

A necromancer driven out of high society in Silverlight for his indulgence in the dark arts. Now he lives among the undead, using his unliving servants to fulfil his needs, as well as bring him back unwilling subjects for his experiments.

Dantos is a master of weapons, fascinated by both their construction and application. A true obsessive, his borderline inhuman dedication to his craft made him an excellent tool for his Queen, the great witch Megara. After a time, their monstrous similarities brought them closer, and Dantos became her personal strategist as well as a close confidant. Inspired by Megara’s secrets, it was Dantos who discovered that Venom Sap could be used to separate magical alloys, allowing the fusion of powerful artifacts into even greater weapons.

Valencia was once a human baroness, part of an affluent noble family from before the great war. Always hungry for power, ambitious, and utterly without moral tethers, she saw the rise of Dracula and his legions as an opportunity to surpass her human limitations and become something greater. Impressed with her utter depravity, Dracula granted the baroness’ wish. Valencia now serves as a vicious general of the Legion of Noctum.

When Dracula fell centuries ago, it seemed like the Church of Luminance had done the impossible. The death of the Immortal King. However, in his final moments, Dracula enacted his final gambit and cast a cloud over Vardoran. The blood rain that followed would plant the seeds of Dracula’s will across the realm, twisting it, and filling it with his storied essence. \n\nAfter death, the Immortal King’s soul was cast out to where his otherworldly powers originated, the Shadow Realm. There he lingered, biding his time. Now the time has come. Dracula floods the world with his monstrous Legion of Noctum, having them gather the blood necessary for him to become whole once more and return to Vardoran.

Elena was once a talented weaver, a wife, a mother, and friend. Now she is none of those things. When Dracula’s forces descended on her village and harvested its people, she hid in the chaos and witnessed the horror first-hand. Discovered by the Immortal King himself, he saw an opportunity to twist a suffering creature to his whim. He shaped her into an ice-cold killing machine, a perfect servant for the Legion of Noctum.

A cold-blooded killer, and the scion of a long line of vampire hunters. Few are as prepared to face the rising tide of the vampire threat as Tristan, and his drive to exterminate the last of the unholy threat is second to none.

This mysterious Vampire hunter has arrived from lands unknown on a fervent mission to cut down anything that they might deem a threat to mankind. Monster and Vampire alike will find themselves the target of this stranger’s ire, and even worse, on the wrong end of the exotic stranger’s unique battle whip… an intriguing new tool of war.

Originally an engineer responsible for advancements in practical electrical weapons, Domina’s incredible advancements were born of her hands-on, reckless approach to testing. Though this approach led to her demise, she was brought back to life by the maddening machinery of the infamous Doctor Henry Blackbrew. Domina’s sadism and masochism are unlimited, unmatched, and perhaps unstoppable in her pursuit of protecting and “policing” the people of Gloomrot.
An unspeakable horror that lurks in the snowy corridors of the Hallowed Mountains. Some say it used to be a simple woodsman. Most don’t dare invoke its name at all.

None of the werewolves asked for this curse, but what makes Willfred dangerous is that he embraces it. He is the chief of the werewolf village not just for his ferocity, but the way he embodies the carnivorous terror of his twisted little village.

An honored and deeply respected chief of a small, reclusive village of outcasts. Despite the imminent threat of the Cult of the Damned, dangerous wildlife, and even the rumor of Werewolves stalking northern Dunley, he manages to keep his people fed and happy.

A powerful psychopomp that taps into mysterious spiritual sources. Polora is one of the only known mortal links to fairy kind and driven to the brink of sanity by her intimate connection to nature. Her dream-like home is alive with unique, enchanted plant life.

A creature whose story has long since been lost to the ages, though not without resemblance to some few legendary creatures that were once men. One cannot help but wonder what strange corruption has taken root in Vardoran.

Some say Matka is the oldest of the witches, but the truth is that nobody knows how or when these timeless creatures were born. A force of nature and a mockery of humanity, she is utterly beyond reason.

The trail of this scent bears the unmistakable signature of Dracula, the Immortal King. When Dracula fell, he cursed the world of Vardoran with a blood rain, a scourge in which many perished. Some who survived became unknowingly twisted by the downpour, their bloodlines forever empowered by his malice. This mighty predator is infused with that legacy.

A mad cultist that claims to be the vessel of his decapitated horse, ‘Foulrot the Soultaker.’ He also claims his blades take their victims straight to ‘The Great Darkness’, an effort to feed or please some infernal power. Whether or not there’s truth to his claims, his headcount is undeniable.
Sells a wide variety of <teal1>general goods</c>.
A purveyor of rare goods, all acquired through the most upstanding and unquestionable means.
A merchant that sells mysterious vampire <teal1>artifact weapons</c>. In your hands, uncover their hidden, or even <legendary>legendary</c> properties.

A huntress from a noble house in Brighthaven, famous for their development of new-age weaponry that rivals even the genius of the scientists of Gloomrot. After the disappearance of her brother, rumor has it the expert marksman stole an impressive arsenal of experimental weapons to aid in her hunting down the culprit.

A massive new zone with two unique areas twisted in the pursuit of cruel science. Find new experiences all across Vardoran in this sweeping update, including multiple floor castles, new enemies, improved blood hunting, new weapons and spells, and much more!
Embrace your richest palette and indulge in ultimate luxury! From servant to master, your gilded castle will inspire untold envy in every color.

Travel to the rich natural lands of Oakveil, face the Venom Blades, learn the dark secrets of venom sap, and invade the Serpent Queen Megara’s magical sanctum… or meet your end trying.\nStart up a new world to experience a whole new world of V Rising!

This testing period will be under strict NDA, which means there will be ABSOLUTELY NO STREAMING, RECORDING, OR SCREENSHOTS, OR SHARING TEST CONTENT DETAILS OF ANY KIND. Purpose This agreement is made to protect the confidential information Stunlock Studios shares with you during the preparations for the V Rising BETA test, during the actual BETA test, and all the communication that will follow, as well as all other cooperation, to prevent any damage that could be caused to the company by leakage of such information. Definition of Confidential Information 'Confidential Information' means any information or data relating to V Rising's BETA test, and shall include, but not limited to: a)Ideas, trade secrets, trademarks, know-how, analysis, methods, source code, concepts, assets, and documents. b)Video footage recordings, screenshots, audio recordings, and all forms of media that include V Rising's BETA test, documentation related to it, or communication between you and the company regarding the test. Confidentiality Obligation You shall keep the Confidential Information in confidence and shall not publish, disclose, distribute, transmit, post, or otherwise make available, directly or indirectly, any Confidential Information to any third party. Remedies You understand and agree that the Confidential Information is a valuable asset in Stunlock Studios' business and that the disclosure of the same third party in breach of this Agreement will cause Stunlock Studios irreparable harm. You, therefore, agree that Stunlock Studios shall be entitled to claim appropriate injunctive relief in a court of law if a breach of this Agreement is made by you. Permitted Disclosures You may disclose the Confidential Information in accordance with a judicial or governmental order; provided, however, that you give Stunlock Studios prompt written notice of such order so Stunlock Studios has the opportunity to seek an appropriate protective order or another remedy to protect the Company. You agree to only disclose as much Confidential Information as necessary and to help Stunlock Studios in any way possible to minimise the harm made to the company. Any other disclosure is a breach of this Agreement without the written consent of such disclosure from Stunlock Studios. Governing Law and Jurisdiction Laws This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Sweden. Arbitration Any dispute, controversy, or claim arising out of, or in connection with, this Agreement, or the breach, termination, or invalidity of the Agreement, shall be settled by arbitration in accordance with the rules of Expedited Arbitration of the Arbitration Institute of the Stockholm Chamber of Commerce. The place of arbitration shall be Gothenburg, Sweden. The language to be used in the arbitral proceedings shall be English, if not otherwise agreed between the Parties. Confidentiality The Parties undertake and agree that all arbitral proceedings conducted with reference to this arbitration clause will be kept strictly confidential. This confidentiality undertaking shall cover all information disclosed in the course of such arbitral proceedings, as well as any decision or award that is made or declared during the proceedings. Information covered by this confidentiality undertaking may not, in any form, be disclosed to a third party without the written consent of the other Party. This notwithstanding, a Party shall not be prevented from disclosing such information in order to safeguard in the best possible way his rights regarding the other Party in connection with the dispute, or if the Party is obliged to so disclose pursuant to statute, regulation, a decision by an authority, a stock exchange contract or similar.

In these honorable realms, vampires fight alongside one another as they reclaim Vardoran. Rise on your own or join a clan with up to four vampires as you conquer the world together.

In these war-torn realms, vampires compete for supremacy as they reclaim Vardoran. At certain time frames, vampires may siege each other’s castles and raid them for goods. Rise on your own or make a blood pact with another vampire to conquer the world together.

In these chaotic realms, vampires compete for supremacy as they reclaim Vardoran. Risk it all in every encounter as you drop all loot upon death. At certain time frames, vampires may siege each other’s castles for goods, conquer them, or even destroy them completely. Improve your chances of survival by joining a clan with up to four vampires.

In these war-torn realms, solitary vampires compete for supremacy as they reclaim Vardoran. At certain time frames, vampires may siege each other’s castles and raid them for goods. Rise on your own and face other lone wolf vampires.

In these war-torn realms, vampires compete for supremacy as they reclaim Vardoran. At certain time frames, vampires may siege each other’s castles and raid them for goods. Gather allies in the game of blood and power by joining a clan with up to four vampires as you expand your domain.
